item.title: Starbucks baristas strike in three U.S. cities during pre-Christmas rush
item.description: Starbucks baristas are striking in Los Angeles, Chicago and Seattle.

item.title: What a government shutdown could mean for air travel
item.description: A government shutdown could mean thousands of air traffic controllers and TSA agents would go without paychecks.

item.title: Trump transfers all his DJT shares to his revocable trust, new SEC filings show
item.description: Donald Trump's shares in Trump Media, owner of the Truth Social app, were worth about $4 billion, the largest portion of his net worth.

item.title: Key Fed inflation measure shows 2.4% rate in November, lower than expected
item.description: The PCE price index was expected to show a 2.5% annual inflation rate in November after rising 0.2% monthly.

item.title: From Nike to Intel, CEO departures at U.S. companies hit a record this year
item.description: CEO exits at U.S. public companies were a record in 2024 as they faced competitive and strategic challenges.
